prompts: Create a gooey, purple Pokemon that loves to lurk in the shadows.
Show me a slimy creature with a big mouth and a mischievous grin.
Generate an amorphous Pokemon that thrives in polluted areas.
Design a toxic Pokemon that spreads its poison in urban environments.
Imagine a blob-like creature that can engulf its enemies with ease.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a puddle of sludge but has a charming personality.
Give me a Pokemon that can change its shape and is often found in caves.
